tooltip.gravels_extended_battles.blood_m: A disc with Blood_memory-type data. It changes Silvally's type.
tooltip.gravels_extended_battles.blood_p: A tablet that raises the power of Blood_plate-type moves. When held by Arceus, it changes to the Blood_plate type.
tooltip.gravels_extended_battles.bloodiu: Z-Crystal associated with the Bloodium_z type and allows Pokémon to upgrade their Bloodium_z-type moves to Z-Moves.
